description: This is the native json string data type

default.description: Default value of this is missing or null

long.description: The editor should render as a multi-line textbox

enum.description: The value of this string is restricted to one of the provided values

min-length.description: The value must be longer or equal to the provided minimum length

max-length.description: The value must be shorter or equal to the provided maximum length

equal.description: This is a string that the value must match

pattern.description: The value must match this regex

pattern-not.description: The value must not match this regex

format.description: This restricts the value to one of several built-in formats
